title: Cover crop mix. What is the management goal?

tasks.task: Assessing cover crop mix in a field
subtasks: Observe the stage of growth (time of visit)
Identify the presence of volunteer wheat
Note the flowering stage of buckwheat and potential seed production
Observe the condition and size of radishes
Check the growth of soybean and corn in the mix
Assess the growth of sunflowers and anticipate management challenges
Evaluate the presence and growth of clover
Consider the balance between different species in the mix
Address potential nutrient deficiencies (e.g., nitrogen不足 in radishes)
Anticipate decomposition and management of buckwheat and radish residues
Plan for the transition to winter wheat (if applicable)
